title: FiT-Central X-Stream League B Meet 1
description: We competed in 5 qualification matches, ending with a record of 2-3-0. A great learning experience to kick off the competition season.

title: FiT-Central X-Stream League B Meet 2
description: Our second league meet. We've made improvements to our mechanisms and are ready to score even higher!

title: FiT-Central X-Stream League B Meet 3
description: The final regular season meet. This is our last chance to accumulate league points before the tournament.

title: FiT-Central X-Stream League Tournament
description: The League Championship! We will compete against all teams in our league for awards and advancement to the Regional Championship.
